question: 恐怖症
sourceMnemonic: You have a <kanji>fear</kanji>, this fear is <kanji>scary</kanji>, oh, and it's a <kanji>symptom</kanji>, so it's kind of just in your head. What kind of symptoms occur when you are scared and have fear? How about when you have a <vocabulary>phobia</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
